Text.Page:
The argons are involved in Thulsa's plans at the most intimate level.

When you kill them, , pry out their cores. We can put those things to good use.

Superb work. Thulsa's the current threat, but we can't let our eyes off the argons.

, I thank you for your sacrifice. I will send these cores to the Mysterium for further research.
Defeat the argons and bring me their cores.
